naslov: Gornji Karin, dvokatnica sa 11 soba, izvrsna prilika za turizam, 550m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji ove kuće dvokatnice koja se nalazi svega 100 metara od mora u mjestu Gornji Karin. Ova kuća je idealna prilika kao unosna investicija za bavljenje turizmom, apartmani ili manji hotel. Kuća se sastoji od prizemlja i dva kata. U prizemlju kuće se nalazi ulazni hodnik, ostava, velika kuhinja, dva skladišta, wc te dvosoban stan s prostranim dnevnim boravkom, kuhinjom s blagovanjem, wc-a s kupatilom te se iz samog stana izlazi na natkrivenu terasu s kominom. S unutarnjeg stepeništa dolazimo na prvi kat koji ima pet odvojenih soba, dva kupatila s wc-om te jednog izdvojenog toaleta, veliki dnevni boravak za zajedničko druženje i kuhinju, kao i praonicu s veš mašinama te prostrani balkon. Na drugom katu (visoko potkrovlje) se nalazi četiri velike odvojene sobe od kojih svaka ima vlastito kupatilo s wc-om te se na ovom katu također nalazi veliki dnevni boravak. Grijanje je etažno centralno na pelete s klima uređajima, a drugi kat posjeduje i podno grijanje. Vlasništvo i dokumentacija su uredni, objekt posjeduje A+ energetski certifikat te je spreman za novog vlasnika. Za više dodatnih informacija, slika, ili dogovora oko samog izlaska na teren slobodno nas kontaktirajte. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- We are mediating the sale of this two-story house located only 100 meters from the sea in Gornji Karin. This house is an ideal opportunity as a profitable investment for tourism, apartments or a small hotel. The house consists of a ground floor and two floors. On the ground floor of the house there is an entrance hall, a storage room, a large kitchen, two storage rooms, a toilet and a two-bedroom apartment with a spacious living room, a kitchen with a dining area, a toilet with a bathroom, and the apartment itself leads to a covered terrace with a chimney. From the internal staircase we reach the first floor, which has five separate rooms, two bathrooms and two toilets, a large living room for socializing and a kitchen, as well as a laundry room with washing machines and a spacious balcony. On the second floor (high attic) there are four large separate rooms, each of which has its own bathroom with toilet, and on this floor there is also a large living room. The heating is centralized on floors with pellets with air conditioners, and the second floor also has underfloor heating. Ownership and documentation are in order, the facility has an A+ energy certificate and is ready for a new owner. Feel free to contact us for more additional information, pictures, or arrangements about going out to the field.
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Etažno centralno na struju
